name: malarians
description:
Welcome to Malarians, a game developed for Michigan State University's Specialization Certification on Game Development with Unity!

- Created and submitted by Francis :)

--Design Modifications--
1. Created 3 new different levels.
2. Multiple levels include: tutorial, platform-type and a boss fight.
3. Modified menus and other user interface.

--Aesthetic (Visual/Audio) Modifications--
1. Changed the background music for boss battle, menu and regular game levels.

--Gameplay Modifications--
1. Added a dash mechanic for the player.
2. Added different terrains and also added a game border, so that the player can't go outside the level area.
